languages.text: At the end of your turn the guilty party will be shot: your character if the accusation is true, or Prefect if it is false.

traits.locale_text: At the end of your turn the guilty party will be shot: your character if the accusation is true, or Prefect if it is false.

languages.text: If their guilt is proven, at the end of the turn, the Weapon of Justice will fire at this character. If not proven guilty or if the {g|f:2cf8fef6da524c2ea554464b64d4d719}Accuser{/g} is killed, it will fire in Prefect Vultur's direction instead.

traits.locale_text: If the guilt is proven, at the end of the turn, the Weapon of Justice will shoot at this character. If not proven or the {g|f:2cf8fef6da524c2ea554464b64d4d719}Accuser{/g} is killed, it will shoot in Prefect Vultur's direction instead.

If their guilt is proven, at the end of the turn, the Weapon of Justice will fire at this character. If not proven guilty or if the {g|f:2cf8fef6da524c2ea554464b64d4d719}Accuser{/g} is killed, it will fire in Prefect Vultur's direction instead.

If their guilt is proven, at the end of the turn, the Weapon of Justice will fire at this character. If not proven guilty or if the {g|f:2cf8fef6da524c2ea554464b64d4d719}Accuser{/g} is killed, it will fire in Prefect Vultur's direction instead.

languages.text: Если вина будет доказана, в конце хода Орудие правосудия выстрелит в этого персонажа. Если вина не будет доказана или {g|f:2cf8fef6da524c2ea554464b64d4d719}Обличитель{/g} будет убит, оно выстрелит в направлении префекта Вультур.
languages.original_text: If their guilt is proven, at the end of the turn, the Weapon of Justice will fire at this character. If not proven guilty or if the {g|f:2cf8fef6da524c2ea554464b64d4d719}Accuser{/g} is killed, it will fire in Prefect Vultur's direction instead.

traits.locale_text: Если вина будет доказана, в конце хода Орудие правосудия выстрелит в этого персонажа. Если вина не будет доказана или {g|f:2cf8fef6da524c2ea554464b64d4d719}Обличитель{/g} будет убит, оно выстрелит в направлении префекта Вультур.

Если вина будет доказана, в конце хода Орудие правосудия выстрелит в этого персонажа. Если вина не будет доказана или {g|f:2cf8fef6da524c2ea554464b64d4d719}Обличитель{/g} будет убит, оно выстрелит в направлении префекта Вультур.

languages.text: 告発された人物の有罪が証明された場合、ターン終了時に正義の武器がこの人物に向けて発射される。有罪が証明されなかった場合、または{g|f:2cf8fef6da524c2ea554464b64d4d719}告発者{/g}が死亡した場合、正義の武器は代わりにヴァルター総監の方向に発射される。
languages.original_text: If their guilt is proven, at the end of the turn, the Weapon of Justice will fire at this character. If not proven guilty or if the {g|f:2cf8fef6da524c2ea554464b64d4d719}Accuser{/g} is killed, it will fire in Prefect Vultur's direction instead.

traits.locale_text: 告発された人物の有罪が証明された場合、ターン終了時に正義の武器がこの人物に向けて発射される。有罪が証明されなかった場合、または{g|f:2cf8fef6da524c2ea554464b64d4d719}告発者{/g}が死亡した場合、正義の武器は代わりにヴァルター総監の方向に発射される。

languages.text: Si la culpa queda demostrada, al final del turno el Arma de justicia dispara contra este personaje. Si no se demuestra la culpa o el {g|f:2cf8fef6da524c2ea554464b64d4d719}acusador{/g} muere, el Arma dispara contra la prefecta Vultur.
languages.original_text: If their guilt is proven, at the end of the turn, the Weapon of Justice will fire at this character. If not proven guilty or if the {g|f:2cf8fef6da524c2ea554464b64d4d719}Accuser{/g} is killed, it will fire in Prefect Vultur's direction instead.

traits.locale_text: Si la culpa queda demostrada, al final del turno el Arma de justicia dispara contra este personaje. Si no se demuestra la culpa o el {g|f:2cf8fef6da524c2ea554464b64d4d719}acusador{/g} muere, el Arma dispara contra la prefecta Vultur.

languages.text: 如果此角色被宣判有罪，则回合结束时，正义武装会朝此角色开火。如果此角色被宣判无罪，或{g|f:2cf8fef6da524c2ea554464b64d4d719}指控者{/g}被杀死，则正义武装会朝沃尔图尔行政官开火。
languages.original_text: If their guilt is proven, at the end of the turn, the Weapon of Justice will fire at this character. If not proven guilty or if the {g|f:2cf8fef6da524c2ea554464b64d4d719}Accuser{/g} is killed, it will fire in Prefect Vultur's direction instead.

traits.locale_text: 如果此角色被宣判有罪，则回合结束时，正义武装会朝此角色开火。如果此角色被宣判无罪，或{g|f:2cf8fef6da524c2ea554464b64d4d719}指控者{/g}被杀死，则正义武装会朝沃尔图尔行政官开火。

languages.text: Ist seine Schuld am Ende des Zuges erwiesen, feuert die Waffe der Justiz auf diesen Charakter. Wenn die Schuld nicht bewiesen oder der {g|f:2cf8fef6da524c2ea554464b64d4d719}Ankläger{/g} getötet wird, feuert sie in Präfektin Vulturs Richtung.
languages.original_text: If their guilt is proven, at the end of the turn, the Weapon of Justice will fire at this character. If not proven guilty or if the {g|f:2cf8fef6da524c2ea554464b64d4d719}Accuser{/g} is killed, it will fire in Prefect Vultur's direction instead.

traits.locale_text: Ist seine Schuld am Ende des Zuges erwiesen, feuert die Waffe der Justiz auf diesen Charakter. Wenn die Schuld nicht bewiesen oder der {g|f:2cf8fef6da524c2ea554464b64d4d719}Ankläger{/g} getötet wird, feuert sie in Präfektin Vulturs Richtung.

languages.text: Si sa culpabilité est avérée, le bras armé de la justice attaquera le personnage à la fin du tour. Si sa culpabilité n'est pas prouvée ou que l'{g|f:2cf8fef6da524c2ea554464b64d4d719}accusateur{/g} est éliminé, l'arme ciblera la préfète Vultur.
languages.original_text: If their guilt is proven, at the end of the turn, the Weapon of Justice will fire at this character. If not proven guilty or if the {g|f:2cf8fef6da524c2ea554464b64d4d719}Accuser{/g} is killed, it will fire in Prefect Vultur's direction instead.

traits.locale_text: Si sa culpabilité est avérée, le bras armé de la justice attaquera le personnage à la fin du tour. Si sa culpabilité n'est pas prouvée ou que l'{g|f:2cf8fef6da524c2ea554464b64d4d719}accusateur{/g} est éliminé, l'arme ciblera la préfète Vultur.

languages.text: Bu karakterin suçu kanıtlanırsa turun sonunda Adalet Silahı, karaktere ateş eder. Suçlu bulunmaz veya {g|f:2cf8fef6da524c2ea554464b64d4d719}Suçlayan{/g} öldürülürse silah bu kez Prefekt Vultur'un bulunduğu yöne ateş eder.
languages.original_text: If their guilt is proven, at the end of the turn, the Weapon of Justice will fire at this character. If not proven guilty or if the {g|f:2cf8fef6da524c2ea554464b64d4d719}Accuser{/g} is killed, it will fire in Prefect Vultur's direction instead.

traits.locale_text: Bu karakterin suçu kanıtlanırsa turun sonunda Adalet Silahı, karaktere ateş eder. Suçlu bulunmaz veya {g|f:2cf8fef6da524c2ea554464b64d4d719}Suçlayan{/g} öldürülürse silah bu kez Prefekt Vultur'un bulunduğu yöne ateş eder.
